title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 483.2 - Name of corporation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 483.2 - Name of corporation

State Regulations

An application for approval of the name of a business
corporation which contains the word "blind" or "handicapped" shall be on forms
provided by the department, shall be executed and submitted in accordance with
department instructions, and shall contain such data and information as may be
required to determine that the use of such words in the corporate name will not
tend to mislead or confuse the public into believing that the corporation is
organized for charitable or nonprofit purposes related to the blind or the
handicapped. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
483.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
